channel.title: PerfectionX - Spawn - PK - Premade banks - Premade PvP sets - skilling friendly!
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i291.photobucket.com/albums/ll314/zeshan_2005/PerfectionXHomePage_zpse23e9187.png[/img] [b]
Hello and welcome to my [b]PerfectionX online[/b] project, I present to you the quickest oldschool Spawn/Pk server where all your banks and gears are already set for you!
[SIZE=4][B][U]Please guys keep it peaceful[/U][/B][/SIZE] [B][SIZE=5]If you are an old player from PerfectionX please note that we fully reworked our combat system![/SIZE][/B]
Right, lets begin with why you should join PerfectionX?
Yes PerfectionX is Spawn/Pk based so to whom ever likes to Pk instantly then this is the server for you! But wait.. you want an Eco? and maybe some PVM? No worries we've got both! We've based our Eco of PK points, Yes you can exchange and purchase Pk points. You can gain Pk points in numerous ways. You can either Pk for them, PvB (Player Vs bosses) for them or you can just slayer PVM Which gives you the rewards of Pk points depending on how hard the task is.
We have enbeded tons of features to both server and client. this features include
[B]Our own bounty hunter system![/B] Player Attack & Follow clipping Most Exploits fixed Cheat Client Patched Clan chats 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. 100% Switching System Vote point shop & Pk Point shop Pk Exchange System[b] Ready Banks! Ready Gears! 24/7 Online time![/b] Quest tab - Spawn tab Player Titles Correct food & Pot delay PKP System Perfect slayer system with rewards - Tab to reply to private messages - 100% customizeable titles - New items in-game that some of you have been asking for or wondering about - A completely reworked login UI design - Fixes for some of the client-sided bugs you may have experienced, such as having to restart client after X amount of login attempts. - An item finder built into the client so you can look up items on the client (it connects to ItemDB.biz) - A price checker so you know what the prices are at ALL times, according to players. - A built in screenshot tool that works flawlessly and smoothly while you play.
Bossing enabled
D-L Client - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96435947/PerfectionX%20Cache/client.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96435947/PerfectionX%20Cache/client.jar[/url] Webclient -[url=http://www.perfectionx.org/webclient.html]PerfectionX Webclient[/url] Forums - [url=http://www.Perfectionx.org]PerfectionX Play Now![/url] Enough with the chit chat, Here's a preview!
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=purple]Customise your hot keys![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zz8cjt.png[/img] Because why not? :o
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=orange]Place bounty on your enemies if you can't kill em ;)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e5ff2bed678076974ff55e12245e214a.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=green]We know you Pkers sometimes get lazy, so we took the liberty of making Pre-made sets/banks for you :D[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/79af482d28edf729d11c764da6a9de41.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c3b425beedefcd8189f0c5af7e0d68fc.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c9b80f4367c1de5ad641f23dae31c895.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=blue]Pre-made bank! (You can chose if you want it or not when you first log in)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/ecb5779d23e6bc52bd37fd67c2b52891.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=5][COLOR=blue]Here's the best part! If you want to make your own! custom quick pk set, you can![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [B]Chose equipment set[/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/3367b83eb2911c4445f8d9dab3fa7e3c.gif[/img] [B]Chose inventory set[/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/0bab61f50af0df2d7d9a43502789127f.gif[/img] [B]Now choose your set and go pk![/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/bae7c29266819eebef59754663c4b879.gif[/img]
[COLOR=green][B][U]Do not worry, you can't find dupes through the custom Quick-Pk sets creation, it will first look for the item if you have it in your bank, If not then it will only visual display it.[/U][/B][/COLOR] [B][SIZE=4][COLOR=blue]Hmm What if you like doing multiple things like skilling? No problems, we've got that covered too![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/5e4582681abe02882d40b6578c530ff4.png[/img] [COLOR=white][B]Slayer reworked[/B]![/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/66673ea1055edee405ec7b8028044f1e.png[/img] [COLOR=blue][SIZE=5][B]Team events (This is to make random players get along with each other) [/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c52b47b928481497cde1fe5b4ef38e55.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e4db8060d55c1a90af3aa1b9352432e0.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/27ba8a0a023742dce26f31c065aa6b97.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/7896c547bc2f32997fbb1caa87074b9a.png[/img]
[COLOR=blue][SIZE=5][B]Now let's get back to the main reason why we built the server... Pking![/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xvlEQAC.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J4WWSfe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/7abe2b3a9b95cce1132e68e8ac1b0fcb.gif[/img]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjGs4ctZXOw https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7VYIKd5Zq4U [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fab6a6d9955caa0f3dc8091cf8fdaa63.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/3b253f1a990563114f0bbef1c9b64b47.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/a2c151247799c8640946f1b625369922.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/394428610945f9b2e7017243fff86e92.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/463e13a85b1566cbf5c8f5ea7cf7b220.png[/img] Hope to see you online and playing!
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e5acaaf8b491e80259c861b328e8af1b.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://perfectionx.org"]http://perfectionx.org[/URL] [url=http://perfectionx.org/webclient.html]http://perfectionx.org/webclient.html[/url] [/center]

item.title: PerfectionX - Spawn - PK - Premade banks - Premade PvP sets - skilling friendly!
item.dc:creator: @yoddle yoddle
item.description:
@yoddle wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:543415”]I don’t like the idea that you’re taking credit for content you didn’t make (lol lets not get into the whole “Jagex made runescape” argument).
More specifically, I’m talking about that spawn tab.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/437556-2-custom-tabs-pk-servers-interface-only.html
You did very minor edits to the release and called it yours. Again, lets not get into a debate on how every RSPS owner does that at one point or another.

However. This isn’t a negative post. I do like your content (I have not played, I am basing it on the pictures). The custom bank idea is something I’ve never seen before, and the custom binds are pretty neat too.

I think you should update your gameframe to 508 or 525 (the gear one). Just because the orbs weren’t added when the gameframe you have was around (or at least, not that I remember). That and I like the ~500 era gameframe.[/quote]

Hey man, I don’t think in my post I’ve ever said I fully deserve the credit nor have I said it’s fully mine. Giving credits out would take plenty of time, a friend and I spent some time editing the spawn tab to make it how we want it to be, that includes making it switch magicks, making sure you can’t Tb/barrage glitch, making sure you need certain level requirements and such. The only thing I could fairly say I’ve ripped of that tutorial is the actual sprites, everything else was done by me.
However I can see where you’re coming from

Thanks for the decent feedback anyway

And same goes for you (the comment above) I hope you enjoy your stay! tell me your ingame name to receive a personal starter from me

Read full topic
item.source: PerfectionX - Spawn - PK - Premade banks - Premade PvP sets - skilling friendly!

item.title: PerfectionX - Spawn - PK - Premade banks - Premade PvP sets - skilling friendly!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t like the idea that you’re taking credit for content you didn’t make (lol lets not get into the whole “Jagex made runescape” argument).
More specifically, I’m talking about that spawn tab.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/437556-2-custom-tabs-pk-servers-interface-only.html
You did very minor edits to the release and called it yours. Again, lets not get into a debate on how every RSPS owner does that at one point or another.

However. This isn’t a negative post. I do like your content (I have not played, I am basing it on the pictures). The custom bank idea is something I’ve never seen before, and the custom binds are pretty neat too.

I think you should update your gameframe to 508 or 525 (the gear one). Just because the orbs weren’t added when the gameframe you have was around (or at least, not that I remember). That and I like the ~500 era gameframe.

Read full topic

item.title: PerfectionX - Spawn - PK - Premade banks - Premade PvP sets - skilling friendly!
item.dc:creator: @yoddle yoddle
item.description:
@yoddle wrote:

[center]

[b]

Hello and welcome to my PerfectionX online project, I present to you the quickest oldschool Spawn/Pk server where all your banks and gears are already set for you!

[SIZE=4][B][U]Please guys keep it peaceful[/U][/B][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=5]If you are an old player from PerfectionX please note that we fully reworked our combat system![/SIZE][/B]

Right, lets begin with why you should join PerfectionX?

Yes PerfectionX is Spawn/Pk based so to whom ever likes to Pk instantly then this is the server for you!
But wait… you want an Eco? and maybe some PVM? No worries we’ve got both! We’ve based our Eco of PK points,
Yes you can exchange and purchase Pk points. You can gain Pk points in numerous ways. You can either Pk for them,
PvB (Player Vs bosses) for them or you can just slayer PVM Which gives you the rewards of Pk points depending on how hard the task is.

We have enbeded tons of features to both server and client. this features include

[B]Our own bounty hunter system![/B]
Player Attack & Follow clipping
Most Exploits fixed
Cheat Client Patched
Clan chats
100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded.
100% Switching System
Vote point shop & Pk Point shop
Pk Exchange System
Ready Banks!
Ready Gears!
24/7 Online time!
Quest tab - Spawn tab
Player Titles
Correct food & Pot delay
PKP System
Perfect slayer system with rewards

  • Tab to reply to private messages
  • 100% customizeable titles
  • New items in-game that some of you have been asking for or wondering about
  • A completely reworked login UI design
  • Fixes for some of the client-sided bugs you may have experienced, such as having to restart client after X amount of login attempts.
  • An item finder built into the client so you can look up items on the client (it connects to ItemDB.biz)
  • A price checker so you know what the prices are at ALL times, according to players.
  • A built in screenshot tool that works flawlessly and smoothly while you play.

Bossing enabled

D-L Client - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96435947/PerfectionX%20Cache/client.jar
Webclient -PerfectionX Webclient
Forums - PerfectionX Play Now!
Enough with the chit chat, Here’s a preview!

[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=purple]Customise your hot keys![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]


Because why not? :o

[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=orange]Place bounty on your enemies if you can’t kill em ;)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=green]We know you Pkers sometimes get lazy, so we took the liberty of making Pre-made sets/banks for you :D[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]


[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=blue]Pre-made bank! (You can chose if you want it or not when you first log in)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=5][COLOR=blue]Here’s the best part! If you want to make your own! custom quick pk set, you can![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]
[B]Chose equipment set[/B]

[B]Chose inventory set[/B]

[B]Now choose your set and go pk![/B]

[COLOR=green][B][U]Do not worry, you can’t find dupes through the custom Quick-Pk sets creation, it will first look for the item if you have it in your bank, If not then it will only visual display it.[/U][/B][/COLOR]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=blue]Hmm What if you like doing multiple things like skilling? No problems, we’ve got that covered too![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]

[COLOR=white][B]Slayer reworked[/B]![/COLOR]

[COLOR=blue][SIZE=5][B]Team events (This is to make random players get along with each other) [/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]



[COLOR=blue][SIZE=5][B]Now let’s get back to the main reason why we built the server… Pking![/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjGs4ctZXOw
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7VYIKd5Zq4U


Hope to see you online and playing!
